data.name: Core Power Enhancement II
data.description: Increase the maximum AP by 1000 by strengthening core power.

data.name: Enhanced Electrical Output II
data.description: Increase the electricity output to increase the speed of movement by 20%.

data.name: Condenser Reinforcement I
data.description: Strengthen the condenser to increase the total amount of power that can be stored. Booster maximum charge increases by 10%.

data.name: Reactor Efficiency I
data.description: Increase the efficiency of the reactor; increase the dash output by 10%.

data.name: Redesigned Automation System II
data.description: Redesign the weapon automation system. Increases reload speed by 20%.

data.name: Barrel Rotation II
data.description: Increase the rotation speed by strengthening the motor of the gun row. Bullet firing speed increases by 10%.

data.name: Accelerated Elasticity II
data.description: It accelerates the elasticity of the lower body material and improves the jumping power. It improves the jumping power by 20%.

data.name: Enhanced Gas Output II
data.description: It significantly increases the power of hovering gas. Hovering power increases by 20%.

data.name: Firepower Reconstruction II
data.description: Reconfigures the firepower of the weapon you use. Increases damage to all weapons by 15%.

data.name: Enhanced Radar II
data.description: Strengthen radar. Rock-on distance increases by 20%.

data.name: Reserve Barrel Rotation I
data.description: Increase the attack speed of the reserve armament by 10%.

data.name: Reserve Aim Accuracy I
data.description: Increase aiming accuracy by learning the aiming system. The firing error rate of the reserve armament is reduced by 10%.

data.name: Reserve Ammunition Capacity I
data.description: The ammunition of the reserve armament increases by 20%.

data.name: Light Armored Plate I
data.description: Equipped with light protective plate, it improves defense by 5%.

data.name: Protective Magnetic Field I
data.description: Enable the protective magnetic field to ignore damage with a 5% chance of shooting.
